name: The Winston Desk
description: The Winston's large size and powerful profile make it unashamedly luxurious. With its rich wood finish and metal handles, it conveys an elegant exclusivity. Bringing its own unique personality to a room, the Winston is the perfect addition to a high-fashion household. An utterly original office centrepiece, the Winston's rich hues work which serve to enhance the grandeur of the desk. The handles can be finished in any of DAVIDSON's metal finishes, whose shine works beautifully with any of DAVIDSON's luxury timber finishes. The simple, rectangular shape of the handles echoes that of the desk as a whole, with its rectilinear lines and crisp angles. The two rectangular legs are inlaid with the same metal of the handles, a small detail that adds a hint of low-profile glamour. The Winston boasts plenty of storage, with four frieze drawers, two optional filing drawers and two cabinets, all with interiors tinted to match the primary finish for a seamless aesthetic effect. Combining traditionally made drawers to the frieze and soft-close runners to the pedestal drawers, a meticulous eye for detail ensures flawless functionality.
